languages.text: "Я пришла сюда в надежде отыскать ответы на мои вопросы. Но что я вижу? Лишь боль и страдания тех, кого мне не удалось спасти. Тех, кого я оставила, когда была нужна им..."

traits.locale_text: "Я пришла сюда в надежде отыскать ответы на мои вопросы. Но что я вижу? Лишь боль и страдания тех, кого мне не удалось спасти. Тех, кого я оставила, когда была нужна им..."

languages.text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."
languages.original_text: "Я пришла сюда в надежде отыскать ответы на мои вопросы. Но что я вижу? Лишь боль и страдания тех, кого мне не удалось спасти. Тех, кого я оставила, когда была нужна им..."

traits.locale_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."
"I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."
"I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."
"I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."
"I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

languages.text: «Vine con la esperanza de hallar respuestas a mis preguntas. ¿Y qué es lo que encuentro? Nada salvo el dolor y el sufrimiento de aquellos a los que no he sido capaz de salvar. Aquellos a los que abandoné cuando más me necesitaban...».
languages.original_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

traits.locale_text: «Vine con la esperanza de hallar respuestas a mis preguntas. ¿Y qué es lo que encuentro? Nada salvo el dolor y el sufrimiento de aquellos a los que no he sido capaz de salvar. Aquellos a los que abandoné cuando más me necesitaban...».

languages.text: 「自分の疑問に対する答えが見つかることを期待して私はここへ来た。だが実際は何が見える？私が救えなかった者たちの痛みと苦しみだけだ。私を必要としてくれた時に、見捨ててしまった者たちの…」
languages.original_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の疑問に対する答えが見つかることを期待して私はここへ来た。だが実際は何が見える？私が救えなかった者たちの痛みと苦しみだけだ。私を必要としてくれた時に、見捨ててしまった者たちの…」

languages.text: “我来这里想要寻求答案，可我看到了什么？我只看到了痛苦与折磨，看到了那些我没能拯救的人……那些在需要我的时候，却被我抛弃的人……”
languages.original_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

traits.locale_text: “我来这里想要寻求答案，可我看到了什么？我只看到了痛苦与折磨，看到了那些我没能拯救的人……那些在需要我的时候，却被我抛弃的人……”

languages.text: « Je suis venue dans l'espoir de trouver des réponses à mes questions. Et que vois-je ? La souffrance et la détresse de ceux que je n'ai pas su sauver. De ceux que j'ai abandonnés alors qu'ils avaient besoin de moi... »
languages.original_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis venue dans l'espoir de trouver des réponses à mes questions. Et que vois-je ? La souffrance et la détresse de ceux que je n'ai pas su sauver. De ceux que j'ai abandonnés alors qu'ils avaient besoin de moi... »

languages.text: "Ich bin in der Hoffnung hier, Antworten auf meine Fragen zu bekommen. Aber was muss ich erblicken? Nur den Schmerz und das Leid derer, die ich nicht retten konnte. Die, die ich im Stich ließ, als sie mich brauchten ..."
languages.original_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin in der Hoffnung hier, Antworten auf meine Fragen zu bekommen. Aber was muss ich erblicken? Nur den Schmerz und das Leid derer, die ich nicht retten konnte. Die, die ich im Stich ließ, als sie mich brauchten ..."

languages.text: "Buraya sorularıma cevap bulma umuduyla geldim. Peki ne buldum? Yalnızca kurtaramadıklarımın çektikleri acıyı ve eziyeti... Bana ihtiyaçları varken geride bıraktıklarımı..."
languages.original_text: "I came here hoping to find answers to my questions. But what do I see? Only the pain and suffering of those I failed to save. Those I abandoned when they needed me..."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya sorularıma cevap bulma umuduyla geldim. Peki ne buldum? Yalnızca kurtaramadıklarımın çektikleri acıyı ve eziyeti... Bana ihtiyaçları varken geride bıraktıklarımı..."
